Notifications¶

notifications.py defines a set of activity types to serve as informative reminders for the users that some action needs to take place. They usually don’t represent an action themselves.

A complete notification means the notification was read and the action it refers to was done.

The abstract definition of a notification from which all other notifications inherit is also included here.

Base Notification¶

class notifications.nh_clinical_notification[source]¶

Abstract representation of what a clinical notification is. Contains common information that all notifications will have but does not represent any entity itself, so it basically acts as a template for every other notification.

get_form_description(cr, uid, patient_id, context=None)[source]¶

Returns a description in dictionary format of the input fields that would be required in the user gui when the notification is shown.

Parameters:patient_id (int) – patient id
Returns:a list of dictionaries
Return type:list
is_cancellable(cr, uid, context=None)[source]¶

Notifications cannot be cancelled by the user by default.

Returns:False
Return type:bool

HCA Notification¶

class notifications.nh_clinical_notification_hca[source]¶

Represents a generic notification meant to be addressed only for the HCA user group.

Nurse Notification¶

class notifications.nh_clinical_notification_nurse[source]¶

Represents a generic notification meant to be addressed only for the Nurse user group.

Review Frequency¶

class notifications.nh_clinical_notification_frequency[source]¶

This notification addresses the specific need of an observation frequency that needs to be reviewed by the medical staff.

Doctor Assessment¶

class notifications.nh_clinical_notification_doctor_assessment[source]¶

This notification addresses the specific need of a doctor assessment needs to take place.
